name: The Narrator’s Dilemma
description:
The flustered funny narrator has lost the story. All that is left is you, a slimy little thing.

With your decision making the game will turn different ways.

It could happen that you become a baby pokermaster or an old geezer that likes to strip.

Sometimes it turns into slimefiction and you become a slug. Whatever way the story will turn, you will be with the narrator that stays with every of your decisions.

Have fun!

A short game by Manuel Arabadzic, Adrian Köhlmoos & Jessica Börner
made during Game Design studies 2.semester/4.semester with Adventure Creator.
